subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Larry Kehres has retired as the football coach of Mount Union, but his son, Vince, is now running the pre-eminent N.C.A.A. Division III program.
snippet: Larry Kehres has retired as the football coach of Mount Union, but his son, Vince, is now running the pre-eminent N.C.A.A. Division III program.
